document.full_text: rick martin, part of the buffalo sabres' high-scoring "french connection" during the 1970s, has died at the age of 59, the team said on sunday.
document.title: former sabres "french connection" member martin dies
lines_and_colors: rick martin, part of the buffalo sabres' high-scoring "french connection" during the 1970s, has died at the age of 59, the team said on sunday.
